      Retrieves index of player from username, returns uno players

      Handles the user's click events on the screen, after a user click, the method convert the card data into jason object and send the card data to the server.

      Takes the saved information from the previous activity, get the global socket and create turn on the listeners for fetch game and finish game.
      protected void onDestroy()
      when the game activity is finished, disconnect the socket and turn off the listeners.

    • Field Detail

      • app

        UnoApplication app

      • currentGame

        private com.example.administrator.demo1.UnoGame currentGame

      • fetchGame

        private final io.socket.emitter.Emitter.Listener fetchGame
        Listener of fetch game. After a player move, server will update and returns an updated version of currentGame state, this listener will parse the json data set to game objects, and it will throw exception when the variable does not match our setting. Such as UNO Deck, UnoCards, player's current turn, uno players.

      • finishGame

        private final io.socket.emitter.Emitter.Listener finishGame
        This is a listener for the winner. After server returns the name of the winner, it parse the winner's username and return a string.

      • gsocket

        private io.socket.client.Socket gsocket

      • username

        private java.lang.String username

      • onClick

        public void onClick(android.view.View v)
        Handles the user's click events on the screen, after a user click, the method convert the card data into jason object and send the card data to the server. Or on disposal stack, if the card is a wild card, after user's click, it generate toast information about color on the screen.
        Parameters:
        v - The button (view) they toggled

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Takes the saved information from the previous activity, get the global socket and create turn on the listeners for fetch game and finish game. Connect the socket to the server, and send request to server to get the game data set.
        Overrides:
        onCreate in class android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState -

      • onDestroy

        protected void onDestroy()
        when the game activity is finished, disconnect the socket and turn off the listeners.
        Overrides:
        onDestroy in class android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity

      • setActionType

        public com.example.administrator.demo1.Actions setActionType(java.lang.String actionType)
        A helper method for fetch game listener, it takes a String and return a action type object for Uno card. It returns null when the string does not match any action type case.
        Parameters:
        actionType -
        Returns:

      • setColor

        public com.example.administrator.demo1.Colors setColor(java.lang.String color)
        This is a helper method for fetch game listener, this methos helps to set a uno card's color. It takes string parsed from server and return a color object.
        Parameters:
        color -
        Returns:

      • setPlayerType

        public PlayerType setPlayerType(java.lang.String playerType)
        This is a helper method for recognizing a user type, it returns null when the string input doesn't match any cases.
        Parameters:
        playerType -
        Returns:

      • updateCardSlide

        public void updateCardSlide()
        Updates the horizontal slider with the card (Human Players only). After all the cards data parsed, this method will update the views for displaying cards on the screen. when there is a wild card, this will create a dialog view for user to choose a color. This restrict user's card selection when the selected card does not match the color or number or action type.

      • updateDirectionalArrow

        Updates the directional arrow
